query.select: COALESCE( MAX(CASE SM.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN SM.NUMERICAL_VALUE ELSE NULL END), MAX(CASE SM2.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN SM2.NUMERICAL_VALUE ELSE NULL END) )

COALESCE( MAX(CASE SM.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN CAST(SM.NUMERICAL_VALUE AS INT) ELSE NULL END), MAX(CASE SM2.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN CAST(SM2.NUMERICAL_VALUE AS INT) ELSE NULL END) )
COALESCE( MAX(CASE SM.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN SM.ALPHANUMERICAL_VALUE ELSE NULL END), MAX(CASE SM2.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN SM2.ALPHANUMERICAL_VALUE ELSE NULL END) )

COALESCE( MAX(CASE SM.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN QV.LABEL || ' - ' || QV.NAME ELSE NULL END), MAX(CASE SM2.PMFM_FK WHEN &pmfmId%pmfmalias% THEN QV2.LABEL || ' - ' || QV2.NAME ELSE NULL END) )
